æœ€é‡è¦çš„æ˜¯ç‚¹è¿›å»çš„ case studyï¼Œå­¦ä¹ å­¦ä¹ ï¼š

Sui & Mysten Labs have been Hype clients since late 2022. We have helped Sui with token launches, ecosystem marketing, SMM, community, from Testnet until today. Hype 24/7 moderates and secures 7+ Discord servers, 10 TG groups and has ran 10+ community programs including Devrel for Sui for more than 2 years.
ï¼ˆ110+ CREATIVE EXECUTIONS & 30+ COMMUNITY CAMPAIGNS & 4M+ IMPRESSION & 30+ KOL ACTIVATIONSï¼‰

Hype worked with Ink to launch their L2 chain with interactive storytelling, visuals, and community campaigns. The challenge was creating a unique identity and space where users could have fun while being onchain. To achieve this we developed the DeFi Academy concept and built custom engaging legacy tools that enabled Ink to bring DeFi to the masses.
ï¼ˆ100K+ FOLLOWERS & COMMUNITY MEMBERS & 3 COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT CAMPAIGNS & 30+ CREATIVE EXECUTIONS & 1M IMPRESSIONS & 90K+ DEFI ACADEMY PARTICIPANTSï¼‰

Hype partnered with EigenLayer to be their marketing team during their stage 1 Testnet and Mainnet launches. We focused on community onboarding, social media growth, content creation and nailing a successful Mainnet deployment, through a crafted strategic and creative launch campaign.
ï¼ˆ15+ CAMPAIGNS LAUNCHED & 220K+ NFTS MINTED & 230K+ FOLLOWERS AND COMMUNITY MEMBERS & 130K+ TESTNET WALLETSï¼‰

Hype partnered with Taiko to launch their Mainnet, becoming the first based Ethereum rollup. Hype created new sonic and visual components for the brand, and created a campaign that brought life to the world of Taiko, giving their community a sense of collective belonging.
ï¼ˆ1M+ DISCORD MEMBERS & 100K+ NFT MINTS & 600K+ CAMPAIGN SIGN UPS & 10 NFT DESIGNSï¼‰

We partnered with Optimism to bring their summer ecosystem campaign to life with a fresh creative angle that stood out. Superfest reimagined DeFi as a festival experience, blending culture, content and community. The campaign struck the right chord and picked up two industry awards along the way.

Hype teamed up with Flare to help them position themselves as the new kid in DeFi. The brief was to create a campaign that houses Flareâ€™s DeFi offerings in one place for existing and new community members to learn and earn from their Dapps - all wrapped in a cohesive story.

We began working with Babylon in 2024 to help launch the first ever Bitcoin staking testnet. Our campaign combined viral mechanics with a collectible NFT strategy, driving over 100,000 mints in 48 hours. The NFT quickly became the most traded asset on OKX, hitting over $2 million in secondary volume within the first month. In 2025, we returned to support Babylonâ€™s journey to mainnet and TGE. We introduced the Babyloong dragon mascot to bring culture and character to the community, launched a custom community platform and produced a wide range of campaigns, videos and UGC activations to build mindshare ahead of launch.
